BIO

A highly motivated, detail-oriented frontend developer who has a passion for continuous learning and development. Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and ReactJS, with experience in developing responsive web applications.

2024

Freelancer

Frontend Developer

In 2024, I contributed to the development of Safernet.org, a platform promoting online safety and digital rights for children and women. I worked on designing and building a responsive frontend to enhance user experience. I also created several personal web projects, which I continue to share on my GitHub.

2024

Walure Academy

Frontend Developer

I developed the frontend for Budget Buddy, an app that helps users manage their finances. I focused on building an intuitive interface that allows users to track expenses, income, and savings easily.

2020 - Current

Freelancer

Graphic Designer

I work as a freelance graphic designer, creating logos, social media graphics, and website designs. My focus is on helping clients build strong, visually appealing brands.
